nodes.text: Zavery was a male Gamorrean who worked for the Galactic Republic during the Galactic War against the Sith Empire. A trader of speciality goods, Zavery was stationed on the planet Quesh during the war, where he set up a stall within a Republic Supply Center located in the Republic Operational Headquarters. Zavery had green skin and yellow eyes. While at his stall he wore yellow clothing and spoke a language other than Basic to his customers.

Zavery first appeared in Star Wars: The Old Republic, a MMORPG released by BioWare in 2011. In the game he serves as a speciality goods vendor on Quesh. The vendors location is also marked in Star Wars: The Old Republic Explorer's Guide, a strategy guide released for The Old Republic by Prima Games; however, it uses the name "Plaz Avery."
